text: haey knongchamnaom puokke mean anak buongsuong som tha ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. saum trong me tda bratan dl puok yeung nouv brakear la(sokhpheap chivpheap thourthear chamnehdoeng...) nowknong lokey nih ning brakear la( thansuokr) nea thngai barlok haey saum roksaa karpar puok yeung pi tearounakamm nei phleung nork phng
